meanings.definition: A plant of the milkweed family, especially a climbing plant with showy flowers.
meanings.sent1: The asclepiad in the garden had vibrant flowers that attracted butterflies.
meanings.sent2: The asclepiad grew tall and twined around the fence, displaying its beautiful blooms.
meanings.sent3: The asclepiad decided to throw a party for all the other flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The asclepiad stood out among the other plants like a colorful dancer in a sea of green.
meanings.sent5: The asclepiad's flowers were like little stars that lit up the garden at night.

meanings.definition: A person who studies or collects plants of the milkweed family.
meanings.sent1: The asclepiad was excited to add a rare milkweed plant to their collection.
meanings.sent2: The dedicated asclepiad spent hours in the field studying different milkweed species.
meanings.sent3: The asclepiad joked that they were on a first-name basis with all the milkweed plants.
meanings.sent4: The asclepiad's love for milkweed was as deep as the roots of the plants themselves.
meanings.sent5: The asclepiad's knowledge of milkweed was as vast as the fields where they grew.
